Articles.Content:
Hi!

I already know Python 3.4 but I have to pass to Python 2.7 for some reason.

I already know the differences aren't really bigs but I don't want to find a tutorial on Python 2.7 and spot the differences.

Is there a tutorial made specifically to show the differences between 3.4 and 2.7?

Thank you!

Have you seen this? It's not a tutorial, but it covers the important differences.

https://docs.python.org/3/whatsnew/3.0.html
